MIA (Modular Image Analysis)

Modular, object-based analysis for ImageJ/Fiji

View on GitHub
Introduction Getting started Modules List of modules Macros Extending MIA
Back to module list

Fit Gaussian 2D

Description

Gaussian spot fitting. Can take objects as estimated locations. ***Only works in 2D*** ***Only works for refinement of existing spots***

Parameters

  • Input image
    • Type: InputImageP
  • Input objects
    • Type: InputObjectsP
  • Method to estimate spot radius
    • Type: ChoiceP
    • Default value: Fixed value
    • Choices:
      • Fixed value
      • Measurement
  • Radius
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 1.0
  • Radius measurement
    • Type: ObjectMeasurementP
  • Measurement multiplier
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 1.0
  • Limit sigma range
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
  • Minimum sigma (x Radius)
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 0.25
  • Maximum sigma (x Radius)
    • Type: DoubleP
    • Default value: 4.0
  • Fixed fitting window
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
  • Window size
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 15
  • Maximum number of evaluations
    • Type: IntegerP
    • Default value: 1000
  • Remove objects with failed fitting
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: false
  • Apply volume
    • Type: BooleanP
    • Default value: true
